DPRK Government telecommunications delegation off to Thailand
    Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) - The DPRK Government telecommunications delegation led by Minister Ri Kum Bom of Post and Telecommunications left here today for a visit to Thailand.
 It was seen off at the airport by Vice-Minister Pak Myong Chol of Post and Telecommunications, and officials concerned.
